mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM v_member_ship WHERE member_id = #{member_id}

SELECT s.* FROM t_member_deckport_ship_mapping m INNER JOIN v_member_ship s ON m.member_id = s.member_id AND m.member_ship_id = s.ID INNER JOIN t_member_deckport d ON d.member_id = m.member_id AND d.ID = m.deck_id WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id} AND m.deck_id = #{deck_id} ORDER BY POSITION(CONCAT(s.`ID`, ',') IN d.SHIP)
mapper.update: UPDATE t_member_ship SET SOUKOU = #{soukou, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, KARYOKU = #{karyoku, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, KAIHI = #{kaihi, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, RAISOU = #{raisou, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, TAIKU = #{taiku, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, TAISEN = #{taisen, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, SAKUTEKI = #{sakuteki, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, LUCKY = #{luck, typeHandler=MaxMinValueHandler}, KYOUKA = #{kyouka} WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND ID = #{member_ship_id}
